p: The funders had no role in the study design, data collection, data analysis, interpretation, or writing of the study. At the time of the initiation and design of this project, the chief executive of the funding source (J-AR) was the principal investigator of the grant. He had no role in the funding or follow-up of the project from the funder's side after taking on his current funding-source role. He was involved in study design, data interpretation, and writing of the study. DG had full access to all the data in the study and had final responsibility for the decision to submit for publication.
